title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practice Competencies: Connected Learning Experiences for Enhancing Science Teacher Leadership Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement three or more connected learning strategies to solve real-world problems in science education.
Learners can establish a professional knowledge-sharing system with peer teachers through collaborative dialogue based on digital networks.
Learners can derive two or more practical insights for creating human-centered learning environments in teacher leadership contexts.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
